title: Eden Energy Medicine Workshop with Integrative Health Specialist Christina Ferber — Dragonfly Yoga FXBG

cleaned_text: Harness the power of Spring's growth and expansion with tools and techniques from Eden Energy Medicine! Eden Energy Medicine works directly with the body's energy systems to help create health and wellness. It draws upon ancient healing practices (such as Traditional Chinese Medicine, Yoga, Ayurveda, and Qigong) and combines them with scientific understandings to help the body activate its own natural healing abilities. What you'll learn: Learn a daily self-care routine that will balance the energies in the body! Learn about the Five Elements and how to utilize them to stay balanced this Spring and through all the seasons! Learn ways to get and stay grounded for optimal health! And much more! Cost: $25 (10% discount for Unlimited PLUS members) Christina Ferber is a Clinical Licensed Eden Energy Medicine Practitioner who is a firm believer in empowering others to take charge of their health and claiming all that life has to offer. She writes a monthly column for Front Porch Magazine about Eden Energy Medicine and is an approved Integrative Medicine Provider at Mary Washington HealthCare's Cancer Center.
